General.Name: Lunit Inc.
General.Description: Lunit Inc. operates as a medical AI software company in South Korea. Its AI solutions assists in discovering cancer and predicting cancer treatment outcomes. It offers Lunit INSIGHT CXR, an AI solution for chest x-ray analysis; Lunit INSIGHT MMG, an AI solution for mammography analysis; Lunit SCOPE IO, an AI solution for immune-oncology tissue phenomics; and Lunit SCOPE PD-L1, an AI solution for PD-L1 expression analysis. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
